title: Android 11 - how to uninstall
content:
I downloaded Android 11 a few days ago and I want to downgrade back to Android 10. HOW DO I DO THIS? 
Since I downloaded Android 11 I have been having problems with calls (takes 25 seconds to ring after dialing a number, 2 minutes into calls I can't hear other person but they can hear me, blue tooth drops, how the freak do I take quick screenshot anymore?).
